name: FEAR OF UP TOP SPACE
description:
There were 2 crew members at the beginning of the cheep bus light year space ship  of 1967, but only 2 in the aftermath of the sleeping terror...

Witness a truely bad sci-fi game, with a 60s aesthetic. Each time you play nothing changes 

you need this to play it https://www.construct.net/en

+ fear of the sea
